content:
Sure, here are a few slogans that convey the idea that EmailTru provides a hassle-free service that runs effortlessly, allowing the client to focus on the core part of their business:

1. "EmailTru: Effortless email marketing, effortless growth"
2. "EmailTru: Hassle-free email, hassle-free growth"
3. "EmailTru: Email on autopilot, business on the fast lane"
4. "EmailTru: Email handled, business grown"
5. "EmailTru: Effortless email, effortless success"
6. "EmailTru: The email agency that runs like clockwork"
7. "EmailTru: Email made easy, business made better"
8. "EmailTru: Email handled, focus on your core business"
9. "EmailTru: Email marketing without the hassle"
10. "EmailTru: The email agency that works while you sleep"

These slogans convey the idea that EmailTru provides a hassle-free service that runs effortlessly and allows the client to focus on the core part of their business. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing without the need for them to put in the effort and still achieve great results.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
